Flow.description: Temporary flow to create advice checklists for data gathering/analysis split.

formulas.name: employmentText
householdSavingText
formulas.expression: "Cash: £" + TEXT({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.CashSavingsMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.CashSavingsMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "ISAs: £" + TEXT({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.IsaSavingMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.IsaSavingMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "Pensions: £" + TEXT({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.PensionsSavingsMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.PensionsSavingsMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "Others: £" + TEXT({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.OthersSavingMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.OthersSavingMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br}

formulas.name: householdSpendingText
formulas.expression: "Essential: £" + TEXT(ROUND({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.EssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " pm / £" + TEXT(ROUND(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.EssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " py" + {!br} + "Non-essential: £" + TEXT(ROUND({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.NonEssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " pm / £" + TEXT(ROUND(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.NonEssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " py" + {!br} + "Rent: £" + TEXT(ROUND({!$Record.Advice_Household__r.RentMonthly__c},2)) + " pm / £" + TEXT(ROUND(12*{!$Record.Advice_Household__r.RentMonthly__c},2)) + " py" + {!br} + "Charitable giving: " + {!$Record.Advice_Household__r.Giving__c}

formulas.name: liabilitySummaryIndividual
formulas.expression: {!Liabilities.LiabilityType__r.Name} + {!br} + "Balance: £" + TEXT({!Liabilities.Balance__c}) + {!br} + "Interest rate: " + TEXT(100*{!Liabilities.InterestRate__c}) + "%" + {!br} + "Fixed rate expiry: " + TEXT({!Liabilities.FixedRateExpiry__c}) + {!br} + "End date: " + TEXT({!Liabilities.EndDate__c}) + {!br} + {!br}

formulas.name: recommendedReserveText
formulas.expression: "3/9/12/24 months expenditure = £" + TEXT(3*{!totalExpenditure}) + " / £" + TEXT(9*{!totalExpenditure}) + " / £" + TEXT(12*{!totalExpenditure}) + " / £" + TEXT(24*{!totalExpenditure}) + "." + {!br}

formulas.name: retirementText
formulas.expression: {!Loop_throughClients.AddressedName__pc} + ": Retirement target: " + TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.Retirement_Target__c}) + ". Current age: " + TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.FinServ__Age__pc}) + ". Time to retirement: " + TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.Retirement_Target__c} - {!Loop_throughClients.FinServ__Age__pc})

formulas.name: RiskCallNotesFormula
formulas.expression: {!UnderstandingVar} & BR() & {!FocusOnReturnVar} & BR() & {!FocusOnRiskVar} & BR() & {!VolatilityVar} & BR() & {!ExperienceVar} & BR() & {!KnowledgeVar} & BR() & {!ExperiencedInvestorCommentsVar} & BR() & {!SplittingOfAdviceVar} & BR() & {!RiskDiscussionNotesVar}

Flow.label: zTemp - Advice | Create advice checklists

recordLookups.name: Get_cash_account_financial_product_type
recordLookups.label: Get cash account financial product type

textTemplates.name: cashReservesTextTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Spending:

{!householdSpendingText}

{!educationTextTotal}

{!childcareSpendingTotal}


Liabilities:

{!liabilityTextTotal}


Total outgoings: £{!totalExpenditure} per month / £{!totalExpenditureYearly} per year


Savings:

INSERT


Budget planner: INSERT


Upcoming lump sum spending: INSERT

One-off: INSERT

Luxury spending: INSERT

Total one off spending: INSERT


Recommended reserve:

{!recommendedReserveText}


Current cash: £{!currentCash}

Cash ISAs: £{!cashIsaTotal}


Income:

Net figures calculated using The Salary Calculator or UK Tax Calculators

{!employemntTextTotal}

{!incomeAssetsTotal}


Total (gross) = £{!totalIncomeMonthly} per month / £{!totalIncome} per year

Total (net) = £INSERT per month / £INSERT per year 


Surplus/shortfall:

+/- £INSERT per month / +/- £INSERT per year


Available cash: INSERT

textTemplates.name: RiskCallNotesTemplate
textTemplates.text:
Understanding: {!$Record.Understanding__c};

Focus on return: {!$Record.Focus_on_return__c}; 

Focus on risk: {!$Record.Focus_on_risk__c}; 

Volatility: {!$Record.Volatility__c}; 

Experience: {!$Record.Experience__c}; 

Knowledge: {!$Record.Knowledge__c}; 

Experienced investor comments: {!$Record.Experienced_investor_comments_optional__c}; 

Splitting of advice: {!$Record.Splitting_of_advice_optional__c}; 

Risk discussion notes: {!$Record.Risk_Discussion_Completed__c};

textTemplates.name: willsAndLpa
textTemplates.text:
{!client1Name}

Will in place - {!client1.Valid_Will_in_Place__c}

Wills up to date - {!client1.Is_Will_Up_to_Date__c}

Power of Attorney in Place - {!client1.Power_of_Attorney_in_Place__c}

Power of Attorney type - {!client1.Power_of_Attorney_Types__c}


{!client2Name}

Will in place - {!client2.Valid_Will_in_Place__c}

Wills up to date - {!client2.Is_Will_Up_to_Date__c}

Power of Attorney in Place - {!client2.Power_of_Attorney_in_Place__c}

Power of Attorney type - {!client2.Power_of_Attorney_Types__c}
